DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study establish Bioequivalence ( BE ) 2 different formulation 2 mg/24 hr ( 10 cm^2 ) Rotigotine transdermal patch Chinese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Single-site , Open-label , Randomized , Cross-over Study Healthy Chinese Subjects Evaluate Bioequivalence Single-dose Rotigotine Transdermal Patch Comparing 2 Different Formulations
DOC.detailed_description: Bioequivalence conclude 90 % Confidence Intervals ( CIs ) ratio Treatment A/Treatment B fully include acceptance range 0.8-1.25 AUC ( 0-t ) AUC , within acceptance range 0.7 1.43 Cmax .
